_header: Christ Christian king that on the cross tholed
Subjects: allegories; debates; national policy, discussions of; alliteration
_description: ‘Death & Liffe’, an allegorical vision — 459 non-rhyming alliterative lines

BLAdd27879.First Lines: Christ christen king yt on the crosse tholed…
